articles.description: It was reported earlier this year that bosses were keen to bring Depp, 59, back for a sixth movie and a spin-off series to air on Disney+ in an eye-watering $300million deal.
articles.content:
Johnny Depp is set to return to Pirates of the Caribbean as Jack Sparrow, according to reports. 
 The 59-year-old star, who made his debut as Sparrow in 2003, is rumoured to be reprising his role in… [+2280 chars]
